name: arenite
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of rock that is made of sand or particles (= small pieces) similar to sand: Many of the island's rocks have been identified as relatively quartz-rich arenites. Arenite is a sedimentary rock. Related word
arenaceous
More examplesFewer examplesMost of these sedimentary rock fragments are coarse arenites or fine diamictites. The composition of the arenites is given in Table 2.Arenite is a sedimentary clastic rock with sand grain size between 0.0625 mm (0.00246 in) and 2 mm (0.08 in).
